# metadata

**Instance Property**

The metadata for the output file.

## Declaration

```swift
var metadata: [AVMetadataItem]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This array contains [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem] objects. You use it to add metadata, such as copyright, creation date, and so on, to the recorded movie file.

## Configuring movies

- **movieFragmentInterval**: The number of seconds of output that are written per fragment.

items.description: The number of seconds of output that are written per fragment.
items.name: movieFragmentInterval
